code: check_confidence(data, ...)  # Default S3 method check_confidence(data, by = NULL, ...)

title: Visualize the Distribution of Confidence Values per Keypoint ‚Äî check_confidence
text: data data frame contains least columns keypoint confidence. Additional grouping variables can supplied via argument. ... Arguments passed plotting functions. (Optional) character vector column name(s) used group data summarising. NULL, function defaults "keypoint".

title: Visualize the Distribution of Confidence Values per Keypoint ‚Äî check_confidence
text: tibble/data frame one row per group defined , containing following columns: mean_confidence Mean confidence within group (NA‚Äëremoved). q1 First quartile (25th percentile) confidence. q3 Third quartile (75th percentile) confidence. result can passed directly ggplot2 visualization packages.
